reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: IKI CMC/CCCPA Instutional Capacity building on gender training and the implementation of UNSC resolution 1325

description.narrative: The Cairo Regional Center for Training on Conflict Resolution and Peacekeeping in Africa (CCCPA) and Crisis Management Centre Finland (CMC) have been planning cooperation since 2010. The first gender and peace building training course was carried out by CM C Finland but the uprising delayed the actual course to the early 2012. The partners started to plan more comprehensive way of cooperating in the form of institutional capacity building. This lead to this project where the aim is to build the training capa city of CCCPA so that it can independently give the gender training to the peacekeepers and enhance the implementation of UNSCR 1325 in peacekeeping/peacebuilding. CCCPA functions under the auspices of the Egyptian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and its manda te is to build Egyptian and African peacekeeping capacities by providing integrated training courses to key personnel from civilian staff military and police. The project will last three years and the budget is 794 423 Euros.
